attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment is giving the smoking ban a three year trial.but with the amount of pubs and clubs closing.in three years we won't have any social life to enjoy.i am seeing pubs close down and then burnt down.the non-smokers who said they would use pubs and clubs when the smoking ban came in .has not materialised.we are struggling enough trying to pay our way in society.and we need to relax in warmth and comfort with a drink and a smoke.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
